payload.message: Check #Philosophy group (120363425915475884@g.us) for new messages from allowlist (+19704439545, +628116360610, +62811630409, +19095888622). Read group session history. For any NEW messages (compare timestamps), write them to /Users/enoch/.openclaw/workspace/memory/group-queue.json with: {timestamp, from, text, isCommand}. If new messages exist, reply ANNOUCE: {count} new message(s) queued. If none, reply HEARTBEAT_OK.

Run health check: Execute `openclaw channels status` and parse output. If WhatsApp shows 'disconnected' or 'error', execute `openclaw gateway restart` and reply 'WA_DOWN: restarted'. If Discord shows 'stopped' or 'error', execute `openclaw gateway restart` and reply 'DISCORD_DOWN: restarted'. If both OK, reply 'HEALTHY_OK'.
